title: Tata Motors-owned JLR plugs £500 million into retooling UK plant for electric SUVs
description: Jaguar Land Rover is set to invest £500 million in retooling its Halewood plant in England for electric SUV production. This follows a previous £250 million investment. The company aims to make the facility its first all-electric plant, despite higher costs and weak consumer demand for EVs.
